channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- HT Mega – Absolute Addons for Elementor Page Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- HT Mega – Absolute Addons for Elementor Page Builder

item.title: CVE-2021-24261|2024-08-03T19:28:23.270Z -- unknown -- ht%20mega%20%E2%80%93%20absolute%20addons%20for%20elementor%20page%20builder
item.description: The “HT Mega – Absolute Addons for Elementor Page Builder” WordPress Plugin before 1.5.7 has several widgets that are vulnerable to stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) by lower-privileged users such as contributors, all via a similar method.
